channel.title: Blogs on Adam Abualteen | Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Adam Abualteen | Engineer

item.title: Welcome to my website!
item.description: Glad that you’re here! My Academic Career In 2020, I graduated Polk State Lakeland Collegiate High School with both a high school diploma and an A.A. from Polk State College in Liberal Arts with Magna Cum Laude distinction. At Lakeland Collegiate, I was the President and Team Captain of our school’s Academic Team and competed with other schools in the state of Florida. Before graduation, I was awarded the Florida Bright Futures Scholarship and the USF Director’s Award before entering my freshman year of college.
